body_html:
Okay, I have removed int64 versions of scatter and scatter_nd:

  • tf.gather now supports int64 on GPU
  • tf.gather_nd now supports int32 and int64 on GPU
  • tf.scatter_nd now supports int32 on GPU

@ppwwyyxx I'm trying to test locally, but I seem to be doing it wrong...
body_text:
Okay, I have removed int64 versions of scatter and scatter_nd:

tf.gather now supports int64 on GPU
tf.gather_nd now supports int32 and int64 on GPU
tf.scatter_nd now supports int32 on GPU

@ppwwyyxx I'm trying to test locally, but I seem to be doing it wrong...
body:
Okay, I have removed `int64` versions of `scatter` and `scatter_nd`:
* `tf.gather` now supports `int64` on GPU
* `tf.gather_nd` now supports `int32` and `int64` on GPU
* `tf.scatter_nd` now supports `int32` on GPU

@ppwwyyxx I'm trying to test locally, but I seem to be doing it wrong...
